TEI.2.document_title: William Caruthers to Stephen F Austin, 03-15-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Caruthers to Austin, Lincoln City, Tenn., March 15, 1830. Wants to establish a powder factory in Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 346

text.body:
